after-love-visit.speaker: Lumi
after-love-visit.text: Oh… it's you again.@ I was hoping you'd come back.@ It feels strange when your light isn't here.

love1.speaker: Lumi
love1.text: Heh… maybe a little.@ The current feels colder without you around.@ But that's not the only thing bothering me.

love2.speaker: Lumi
love2.text: There's… something you should know.@ Something dangerous.

options.text: You're starting to sound like you're jealous.

octopus-warning.speaker: Lumi
octopus-warning.text: Down near the trench… there's an octopus that doesn't belong here.@ He moves like a shadow, and everything around him goes silent.

octopus-warning.speaker: Lumi
octopus-warning.text: He's clever.@ He pretends to be friendly.@ But there's something behind his eyes—something hungry.

octopus-warning.speaker: Lumi
octopus-warning.text: If he ever talks to you… please, don't trust him.@ Promise me?

options.text: Are you sure you're not overreacting?

jealous-accuse.speaker: Lumi
jealous-accuse.text: W-what?@ No! It's not like that!@ I'm not jealous— I just don't want you getting hurt.

jealous-accuse.speaker: Lumi
jealous-accuse.text: He's dangerous, I can feel it.@ You think I'd lie just to keep you here?

options.text: I'm sorry. I shouldn't have said that.

love-end.speaker: Lumi
love-end.text: Just… be careful, alright?@ The deep has a way of hiding things that don't want to be found.
